column1: charles c. hall| charles c. hall age 86
column3: middle inlet resident passed away june 16 at bay area medical center in marinette. he was born june 9
column5: minnesota. charles married laura m. breitenfeld february 14
column6: 1985 in milwaukee. charles was employed by the city of milwaukee until retirement. surviving are his wife laura
column7: his children sherrie hall of milwaukee
column9: michigan and marty croff of west allis also 7 grandchildren
column10: 7 great grandchildren and 3 great-great grandchildren. friends and relatives may call at the rhodes-charapata funeral home in crivitz june 23 from 3 p. m. until time of memorial service at 5 p. m. rev. johnathan zietlow officiating .
